member.name: M:PodioAPI.Podio.#ctor(System.String,System.String,PodioAPI.Utils.IAuthStore)
member.summary:
Initialize the podio class with Client ID and Client Secret
You can get the Client ID and Client Secret from here: https://developers.podio.com/api-key
member.param: Client ID
Client Secret

If you need to persist the access tokens for a longer period (in your database or whereever), Implement IAuthStore Interface and pass it in.
By default it takes the SessionStore Implementation (Store access token is session). You can use the IsAuthenticated method to check if there is a stored access token already present
